title: setting up new pixel, transferring data from android, didnt use quick switch adapter very slow
content: INstead of using the quick switch adapter and the android charging cable, I just used the type c to type c cable that came with my new pixel.   The transfer is taking forever (admittedly a lot of data - it did not give me choice of which data to transfer.  My pixel battery will run out before data transfer complete.  How long should I expect data transfer to take?   My old phone says "copying your accounts" and the Pixel 4a says "getting account info" with arrows going both ways.  Thanks for any info/hints/help.  Should I just stop the process and try it again with the Quick Switch adapter?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
